item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network at 5 Essential Elements To Converting Website Visitors into Paying Clients in Westborough, MA on Friday, March 1 from 9:00am to 10:30am sponsored by Cereus Women.

Space is limited and this workshop is promoted elsewhere, so don't delay. See below for registration details

About This Event

You may have a great-looking website, but if it isn’t successfully helping to convert website visitors into paying clients, then something needs to change. Most websites are designed as great-looking brochures instead of client-generating tools defined as part of your overall marketing system.

Your website should be used as the home base, or hub, of your online marketing. Anyone who is using social media or any other online marketing tools, shouldn’t even think about it unless they have an effective website as part of that strategy. This seminar will provide you with a powerful overview of the important aspects you need to know.

During this 45-minute seminar Kim Reddington will share with you:

  • The #1 purpose of your website.
  • The top 3 things that should be included on every page of your website
  • How to create content that resonates with your target audience and gets them to take action
  • How to stand out as the expert in your field

Format

  • Cost: $15 in advance/$20 at the door
  • One 45 minute presentation followed by ~15 minutes of Q&A, plus time for networking.
  • Bring plenty of business cards.
  • Coffee and muffins will be provided.

Agenda

Our agenda for the meeting will be as follows:

9:00 – Sign in and networking, (registration for those not prepaid)
9:15 – Meetup News and go around the room introducing yourself and sharing business cards
9:30 – Presentation with Q&A
10:20 – Closing remarks, Upcoming events
10:30 – Meeting ends

About the Presenter

Kim Reddington’s entrepreneurial career started in 1995 after she decided that dropping her year old son off at day care every day was just too heart-wrenching. She realized the only way to have the flexibility she needed was to create it herself. That’s when she just quit and took off on her own.

Kim’s journey has led her to helping other women entrepreneurs think big with their online marketing to get all the clients they need and is known as a Client-Generating Website Guru. She helps her clients to build a system around their website that will convert their prospective clients into paying clients.

Driving using GPS?

If you are using a GPS or Navigation System, 1900 West Park Drive often does not appear. Use 1 Research Drive (University of Phoenix) and from there enter Westborough Office Park on West Park Drive, go 1/2 mile, 1900 is on your right. Suite 280 is on the second floor.

Cost and How to Register

$15 in advance/$20 at the door.  Capacity is limited and the event is promoted elsewhere, so you need get a ticket in advance.

Register here or click the Paypal button to reserve your spot.

If you don't have a Paypal account, you can still pay through this link.  First click the Paypal button above, then follow the link labelled "Don't Have a Paypal Account?" to pay with your credit card without logging in to Paypal.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: 5 Essential Elements To Converting Website Visitors into Paying Clients
